column4: can anyone help me edit and save my fstab file in nano.  I just tried - and it told me it could not save because it is read-only file system.
what command do I enter in to override this "read-only" status ... and successfully edit my fstab in nano via terminal commands?
have you tried using vim...its better than nano... and either way you have to be sudo to edit your fstab file
I can get around this read-only nonsense by using vim?
